title: In your own words, state what 'self' according to the following philosophers: Socrates, Plato, Descartes, Hume, Kant, Ryle, Merleau-Ponty, and Augustine? - Quora

response.answer_text: Uh-oh. This seems to be another class assignment on which the writer wants everyone to help. Please do the research yourself, and come back and explain it to your readers, so that we can all critique it. Thanks.
